commands: userCheck=$(grep -c ssm-user /etc/passwd); if [ $userCheck -eq 0 ]; then adduser -U -m ssm-user; echo "# User rules for ssm-user" >> /etc/sudoers.d/ssm-agent-users; chmod 440 /etc/sudoers.d/ssm-agent-users; mkdir -p /home/ssm-user/.ssh; chmod 700 /home/ssm-user/.ssh; chown -R ssm-user:ssm-user /home/ssm-user; fi
